    • Method Detail

      • generateMeteoAnalysis

        public static Analytics generateMeteoAnalysis​(java.lang.String city,
                                              java.lang.String directoryURI)
        Generates an Analytics object given a String city and directory URI.
        Parameters:
        city - String name of city
        directoryURI - String URI of the directory where to output images and html
        Returns:
        Analytics object containing list of temperature and contamination, the station and the HTML

      • buildAnalytics

        private static Analytics buildAnalytics​(java.nio.file.Path directory,
                                        long initialTime,
                                        Station station,
                                        java.util.List<Measure> contaminationMeasuresList,
                                        java.util.List<Measure> meteorologyMeasuresList,
                                        java.util.List<Magnitude> magnitudes,
                                        java.util.List<Magnitude> magnitudesMeteo)
        Receives the lists with Measures and Magnitudes and creates the final lists used by Analytics
        Parameters:
        directory - Path used to store the output data
        initialTime - long used to measure time of execution
        station - Station used to filter data
        contaminationMeasuresList - List of Measure of contamination data
        meteorologyMeasuresList - List of Measure of temperature data
        magnitudes - List of Magnitude of contamination magnitudes
        magnitudesMeteo - List of Magnitude of temperature magnitudes
        Returns:
        Analytics Analytics object built
